synopsis: In episode #11 titled 'SOLOOOO', Devam shares a candid and humorous account of his recent knee injury, navigating the healthcare system, and the insights he gained while recovering. He reflects on personal growth, the importance of emotional intelligence, and the beauty of living authentically, all while answering listener questions with wit and wisdom.
quotes: The way you live your life every day is how you end up living your life.
You have to think, you have to give yourself small acts of happiness.
Are you able to feel joy by yourself? Do you have fun in your own company?
Loneliness and melancholy are beautiful feelings; sometimes they just point to some need of yours that isn't being met.
Open your arms if you want to be held.
Relationships end, but the ability to love and be loved does not.
Cooking isn't that hard; ingredients are like colors, you just need to figure out what goes together.
You donâ€™t need to be a master chef to create something amazing.
You have to build a strong foundation in yourself so that anyone you date is an accessory to your life.
Sometimes you just have to listen to your body; loving is a choice, but you have to pick loving yourself first.
